justification: Acknowledges B’s floor and playoff-schedule focus, but asks B to give up their only healthy TE1 (Brian Hill) and a Tier-2 WR for a Tier-5 WR and a committee RB—misaligned with B’s conservative, consensus-driven, workhorse preference. Overstates stability of Brandon Martinez and ignores B’s TE depth needs. Plausible for A, unlikely for B; 0.65 acceptance is optimistic.
